en.welcomeText: I'm happy you're here! Feel free to check out my portfolio to see my artwork, and don't hesitate to reach out if you're interested in a commission.
en.cookieText: KyuArtz uses cookies to enhance your experience. By continuing to use our site, you accept our cookie policy.
en.summaryText: Hello, I'm Kyu, a self-taught freelance artist who has been passionate about drawing since my early childhood. Over the years, I've been dedicated to honing my skills and self-improvement in the art realm. Drawing has been a constant in my life, and in my free time, I continue to create art to enhance my abilities and gain more experience. Despite being a self-learner, I remain persistent and never give up. After four years of focusing on traditional drawing methods, I began to witness noticeable improvements in my work. Intrigued by the popularity of digital art on various social media platforms, I decided to explore this medium. I ventured into digital art using programs such as Microsoft Paint and Adobe Illustrator for my initial creations. While adapting to the challenges presented by digital art techniques, I eventually became comfortable with the process.

en.quote-1: Discover more art created by Kyu
en.quote-2: Happiness is a journey, not a destination. Allow yourself the freedom to experience life as it comes, and happiness often follows when we least expect it
en.quote-3: Cherish every moment that brings you happiness, for one day it will become a fragment of your memories
en.quote-4: No living being is born perfect. I don't judge, for I walk this world with my own imperfections
en.quote-5: A broken mirror can be pieced back together, but it remains shatteredâ€”just like love and trust
en.quote-6: Each of us carries a story yet to be told
en.quote-7: Solitude is my choice, not by chance, but with purpose
